languages.text: Книга содержит богохульные истины культа Кормителей страждущих. Они повествуют о ненасытном Императоре-Пращуре и его грядущем пришествии, которое принесет невиданное единство всем верным.

The book contains the blasphemous tenets of the cult of the Nourishers of the Afflicted. It speaks of the insatiable Emperor-Progenitor and his impending coming that will bestow miraculous unity upon all the faithful.
languages.original_text: Книга содержит богохульные истины культа Кормителей страждущих. Они повествуют о ненасытном Императоре-Пращуре и его грядущем пришествии, которое принесет невиданное единство всем верным.

The book contains the blasphemous tenets of the cult of the Nourishers of the Afflicted. It speaks of the insatiable Emperor-Progenitor and his impending coming that will bestow miraculous unity upon all the faithful.

languages.text: その書物には「苦しむ者を育む」異端の教義が含まれており、飽くことを知らない皇帝の始祖と、その信者全てに奇跡的な統一をもたらすとされる彼の迫る来臨について述べている。
languages.original_text: The book contains the blasphemous tenets of the cult of the Nourishers of the Afflicted. It speaks of the insatiable Emperor-Progenitor and his impending coming that will bestow miraculous unity upon all the faithful.

traits.locale_text: その書物には「苦しむ者を育む」異端の教義が含まれており、飽くことを知らない皇帝の始祖と、その信者全てに奇跡的な統一をもたらすとされる彼の迫る来臨について述べている。

languages.text: L'ouvrage liste les doctrines blasphématoires de la secte des Nourrisseurs des souffrants. Il mentionne l'insatiable Empereur-Géniteur et son arrivée prochaine qui offrira une unité miraculeuse à tous ses fidèles.
languages.original_text: The book contains the blasphemous tenets of the cult of the Nourishers of the Afflicted. It speaks of the insatiable Emperor-Progenitor and his impending coming that will bestow miraculous unity upon all the faithful.

traits.locale_text: L'ouvrage liste les doctrines blasphématoires de la secte des Nourrisseurs des souffrants. Il mentionne l'insatiable Empereur-Géniteur et son arrivée prochaine qui offrira une unité miraculeuse à tous ses fidèles.

languages.text: 这本书介绍了“苦难滋养者”崇拜的亵渎信条，具体讲述了永不餍足的元祖神皇，其中详细介绍了他赐予所有信徒的恩典，以及他是如何将所有信徒奇迹般地团结在一起的。
languages.original_text: The book contains the blasphemous tenets of the cult of the Nourishers of the Afflicted. It speaks of the insatiable Emperor-Progenitor and his impending coming that will bestow miraculous unity upon all the faithful.

traits.locale_text: 这本书介绍了“苦难滋养者”崇拜的亵渎信条，具体讲述了永不餍足的元祖神皇，其中详细介绍了他赐予所有信徒的恩典，以及他是如何将所有信徒奇迹般地团结在一起的。

languages.text: El libro contiene los preceptos blasfemos del culto de los Nutridores de los Afligidos. Versa sobre el insaciable Emperador-Progenitor y su inminente llegada, que otorgará una unidad milagrosa a todos sus fieles.
languages.original_text: The book contains the blasphemous tenets of the cult of the Nourishers of the Afflicted. It speaks of the insatiable Emperor-Progenitor and his impending coming that will bestow miraculous unity upon all the faithful.

traits.locale_text: El libro contiene los preceptos blasfemos del culto de los Nutridores de los Afligidos. Versa sobre el insaciable Emperador-Progenitor y su inminente llegada, que otorgará una unidad milagrosa a todos sus fieles.

languages.text: Das Buch enthält die blasphemischen Grundsätze des Kults der Nährer der Heimgesuchten. Es spricht von dem unersättlichen Imperator-Progenitor und seiner bevorstehenden Ankunft, die allen Gläubigen wundersame Einheit schenken wird.
languages.original_text: The book contains the blasphemous tenets of the cult of the Nourishers of the Afflicted. It speaks of the insatiable Emperor-Progenitor and his impending coming that will bestow miraculous unity upon all the faithful.

traits.locale_text: Das Buch enthält die blasphemischen Grundsätze des Kults der Nährer der Heimgesuchten. Es spricht von dem unersättlichen Imperator-Progenitor und seiner bevorstehenden Ankunft, die allen Gläubigen wundersame Einheit schenken wird.

languages.text: Müteessirleri Besleyenler tarikatının kâfir ilkelerini içeren bir kitap. Doymak bilmez Ata İmparator'dan ve onun gelişinin nasıl da tüm inananları mucizevi bir şekilde bir araya getireceğinden bahsediyor.
languages.original_text: The book contains the blasphemous tenets of the cult of the Nourishers of the Afflicted. It speaks of the insatiable Emperor-Progenitor and his impending coming that will bestow miraculous unity upon all the faithful.
